title: Trump faces tax bill setback: Medicaid overhaul ruled out
shortDescription: Key Medicaid provisions in President Trump's legislative package can't be protected from the Senate filibuster.

title: 'Big Beautiful Bill' cuts from Senate
shortDescription: Here's whats left of Donald Trump's "Big Beautiful Bill" after Senate cuts due to the "Byrd rule."

title: Tiger Woods announces relationship with Trump Jr.’s ex-wife
shortDescription: Tiger Woods has confirmed that he is in a relationship with Vanessa Trump, the former daughter-in-law of U.S. President Donald Trump.

title: Daily Briefing: NATO charms Trump
shortDescription: Foreign leaders paid kindness to Trump — but why? Here is the news to know on Thursday.

title: Senate Republicans fret over big Trump bill’s unpopularity
shortDescription: As the Senate works to pass its version of Trump's priority legislation, Republican lawmakers are raising concerns about the unpopular bill.

title: Capitol Police pull protesters' banner
shortDescription: Capitol Police and protesters faced off amid a protest against Republican's “One, Big, Beautiful Bill.”

title: Putin 'difficult' over Ukraine war, Trump to NATO
shortDescription: President Donald Trump met with Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelenskyy at a NATO Summit.

title: Unsure when Trump's big bill will move forward? So are the senators
shortDescription: Some lawmakers are optimistic the finish line will come this weekend. Other conservative holdouts aren't so sure.

title: Trump not “daddy,” says NATO chief
shortDescription: NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte said he was not calling President Donald Trump “daddy,” explaining the remark was a metaphor for U.S. leadership.

title: Congresswoman pleads not guilty to federal charges over ICE facility
shortDescription: Congresswoman LaMonica McIver appeared in federal court June 25 to face federal charges after her visit to the Delaney Hall detention center in May.

title: Judicial nominee denies whistleblower allegations
shortDescription: Judicial nominee Emil Bove is facing allegations he encouraged the Trump administration to ignore court orders.

title: Trump US CDC nominee backs vaccines as life-saving
shortDescription: If confirmed, Susan Monarez, a career public health official, will report to U.S. Secretary of Health and Human Services Robert F. Kennedy Jr.

title: Video shows 3 generations of Bidens enjoy ice cream as tourists watch
shortDescription: Three generations of Bidens, including the former president himself, are interrupted by starstruck tourists as they enjoy a sweet treat together.

title: 'We made history.' What NYC Mamdani's win means for Democrats and GOP
shortDescription: New York City's Zohran Mamdani delivered a stunning upset that energized progressives and toppled a political dynasty. Now comes the Trump backlash.

title: Congressman nominates Trump for Nobel. What he's said about peace prize
shortDescription: Senate hopeful Rep. Buddy Carter of Georgia nominated Trump for Nobel Peace Prize for Iran-Israel ceasefire. He's been nominated before but never won.

title: Why did Trump pull out of the Iran nuclear deal in 2018?
shortDescription: Donald Trump bombed Iran after Israel attacked in pursuit of detroying its nuclear capabilities. Trump ended a nuclear deal with Iran in 2018.

title: Trump announces increase in NATO defense spending
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said NATO members will now pay more for defense spending. He criticized Spain as one country not contributing more.

title: Which NYC mayoral candidates will be on the ballot in November?
shortDescription: With the primaries in the rearview mirror, all eyes are now on the NYC mayoral general election on Nov. 5.
